LanguageData.CommandLaunchShipDesc: Initiate Launch Sequence and choose the target.
LanguageData.CommandLaunchFleetDesc: Launch the fleet this ship is assigned to.
LanguageData.CommandLoadShipCargoDesc: Load Cargo and passengers into the ship
LanguageData.MessageShipCargoLoadStarted: Your colonists will now load the assigned cargo into {0} (ship)
LanguageData.MessageShipsArrived: Your ships have arrived at their destination.
LanguageData.MessageFleetLaunchImpossible: Cannot launch as fleet. At least one ship doesn't have enough fuel to reach the target.
LanguageData.CommandShipTouchdownDesc: Temporarily land all aircraft for further planning.
LanguageData.CommandRemoveDropsiteDesc: Forcefully removes this site. May take a few seconds to kick in.
LanguageData.CommandLaunchFleetFailDueToNotReady: At least one ship in the fleet isn't ready to launch.
LanguageData.CantAssignZeroHaulers: Cannot start shiploading with no haulers assigned.
LanguageData.CommandSetParkingPositionDesc: Set the ships current position as a parking spot to return to.
LanguageData.CommandTravelParkingPositionDesc: Return this ship to its parking position.
LanguageData.CommandTravelParkingPositionFleetDesc: Return every ship in the fleet to its parking position.
LanguageData.MessagePassengersFull: {0} tried to enter {1}, but there were no empty seats.
LanguageData.ShipSeatsFull: Too many pawns assigned as passengers.
LanguageData.TooBigShipMassUsage: The assigned passengers and cargo are too heavy for this ship.
LanguageData.ShipOutOfFuelCrash: The ship "{0}" ran out of fuel and went down with all passengers being lost.
